name: beta-dse-opscenter
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Datastax Enterprise OpsCenter is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.datastax.com
	Issues: https://www.datastax.com/contactus
postUninstallNotes: DC/OS Datastax Enterprise OpsCenter has been uninstalled.
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is currently a beta candidate undergoing testing as part of a formal beta test program. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.

Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 6.5 CPU | 23040 MB MEM | 32000MB Disk

More specifically, each instance type requires:

DSE node: 3 instances | 2.5 CPU | 12500 MB MEM | 1 10240MB Disk

OpsCenter node: 1 instance | 2 CPU | 6000 MB MEM | 1 10240 MB Disk

Contact Mesosphere and DataStax before deploying this beta candidate service. Product support is available to approved participants in the beta test program. Mutual Mesosphere and Datastax customers are eligible to participate in the beta program.  Contact your rep at either company or techpartner@datastax.com. By using this service you agree to the license terms here: https://gist.github.com/012345/d1df9d43a0dfaa49e628c7bfbc9ffb52

Versions: DataStax Enterprise 5.1.2 (Standard and Max) & OpsCenter 6.1.2
